| Ago" (1981) Misc={{Extra track listing Album = George Harrison Type =
| studio Tracks =
}} }} '"Faster"' is the third single from George Harrison's 1979 eponymous album
[[George Harrison (album)|George Harrison]]. Faster begins the second side of
the LP, and is the sixth track on the CD. It was released as the third single of
the album but was not issued as a 45 in the USA.
